title: Flawed Cadaver: A Collection of Struggles, Hopes, and Clarity Amidst Chaos
description: Inside of this book sits a multitude of poems that paint the colourful strokes of life. Included are the harsh realities, the brimming hopes, and the never-ending struggle to break out of your cage and find yourself. The author uses himself as an honest example. Drink in the madness and find a place amongst these pages.
author: Dakota Jay
